00085 template <class TInputImage, class TOutputImage,
00086           class TInterpolatorPrecisionType=double>
00087 class SuperResolutionImageFilter:
00088     public ImageToImageFilter<TInputImage, TOutputImage>
00089 {
00090 public:
00091 
00092   typedef enum {
00093     MSE=0,
00094     BACKPROJECTION=1,
00095   } OptimizationMethods;
00096 
00097   typedef enum {
00098     BOXCAR=0,
00099     GAUSSIAN=1,
00100   } PSF_type;
00101 
00103   typedef SuperResolutionImageFilter                Self;
00104   typedef ImageToImageFilter<TInputImage,TOutputImage>  Superclass;
00105   typedef SmartPointer<Self>                            Pointer;
00106   typedef SmartPointer<const Self>                      ConstPointer;
00107 
00108   typedef TInputImage                             InputImageType;
00109   typedef TOutputImage                            OutputImageType;
00110   typedef typename InputImageType::Pointer        InputImagePointer;
00111   typedef typename InputImageType::ConstPointer   InputImageConstPointer;
00112   typedef typename OutputImageType::Pointer       OutputImagePointer;
00113 
00114   typedef typename InputImageType::RegionType     InputImageRegionType;
00115   typedef std::vector<InputImageRegionType>       InputImageRegionVectorType;
00116 
00117   typedef ImageMaskSpatialObject< TInputImage::ImageDimension > MaskType;
00118   typedef typename MaskType::Pointer   MaskPointer;
00119 
00121   itkNewMacro(Self);
00122 
00124   itkTypeMacro(SuperResolutionImageFilter, ImageToImageFilter);
00125 
00127   itkStaticConstMacro(ImageDimension, unsigned int,
00128                       TOutputImage::ImageDimension);
00129   itkStaticConstMacro(InputImageDimension, unsigned int,
00130                       TInputImage::ImageDimension);
00131 
00132 
00134   typedef Euler3DTransform<TInterpolatorPrecisionType> TransformType;
00135   typedef typename TransformType::Pointer TransformPointerType;
00136 
00137   typedef std::vector< std::vector<TransformPointerType> > TransformPointerArrayType;
00138 
00140   typedef Size<itkGetStaticConstMacro(ImageDimension)> SizeType;
00141 
00143   typedef typename TOutputImage::IndexType IndexType;
00144 
00146   typedef typename TOutputImage::PointType    PointType;
00147 
00149   typedef typename TOutputImage::PixelType   PixelType;
00150   typedef typename TInputImage::PixelType    InputPixelType;
00151 
00153   typedef typename TOutputImage::RegionType OutputImageRegionType;
00154 
00156   typedef typename TOutputImage::SpacingType   SpacingType;
00157   typedef typename TOutputImage::PointType     OriginPointType;
00158   typedef typename TOutputImage::DirectionType DirectionType;
00159 
00161   typedef ImageBase<itkGetStaticConstMacro(ImageDimension)> ImageBaseType;
00162 
00164   typedef ImageRegionConstIteratorWithIndex< OutputImageType >  OutputIteratorType;
00165 
00167   typedef vnl_vector<double> VnlVectorType;
00168 
00169   // Overrides SetInput to resize the transform
00170 
00171   void AddInput(InputImageType* _arg)
00172   {
00173     m_ImageArray.push_back(_arg);
00174 
00175     this -> SetInput(_arg);
00176 
00177     // Add transforms for this image
00178     m_Transform.resize( m_Transform.size() + 1 );
00179     SizeType _argSize = _arg -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00180     m_Transform[m_Transform.size()-1].resize(_argSize[2]);
00181 
00182     // Initialize transforms
00183     for (unsigned int i=0; i<_argSize[2]; i++)
00184       m_Transform[m_Transform.size()-1][i] = TransformType::New();
00185 
00186   }
00187 
00189   void SetTransform( int i, int j, TransformType* transform )
00190   {
00191     m_Transform[i][j] = transform;
00192   }
00193 
00194   IndexType LinearToAbsoluteIndex( unsigned int linearIndex, InputImageRegionType region );
00195 
00197   itkSetMacro( Size, SizeType );
00198 
00200   itkGetConstReferenceMacro( Size, SizeType );
00201 
00204   itkSetMacro( DefaultPixelValue, PixelType );
00205 
00207   itkGetConstReferenceMacro( DefaultPixelValue, PixelType );
00208 
00210   itkSetMacro( OutputSpacing, SpacingType );
00211   virtual void SetOutputSpacing( const double* values );
00212 
00214   itkGetConstReferenceMacro( OutputSpacing, SpacingType );
00215 
00217   itkSetMacro( OutputOrigin, OriginPointType );
00218   virtual void SetOutputOrigin( const double* values);
00219 
00221   itkGetConstReferenceMacro( OutputOrigin, OriginPointType );
00222 
00224   itkSetMacro( OutputDirection, DirectionType );
00225   itkGetConstReferenceMacro( OutputDirection, DirectionType );
00226 
00228   void SetOutputParametersFromImage ( const ImageBaseType * image );
00229 
00232   itkSetMacro( OutputStartIndex, IndexType );
00233 
00235   itkGetConstReferenceMacro( OutputStartIndex, IndexType );
00236 
00243   void SetReferenceImage ( const TOutputImage *image );
00244   const TOutputImage * GetReferenceImage( void ) const;
00245 
00246   itkSetMacro( UseReferenceImage, bool );
00247   itkBooleanMacro( UseReferenceImage );
00248   itkGetConstMacro( UseReferenceImage, bool );
00249 
00255   virtual void GenerateOutputInformation( void );
00256 
00262   virtual void GenerateInputRequestedRegion( void );
00263 
00265   unsigned long GetMTime( void ) const;
00266 
00267   void AddRegion(InputImageRegionType _arg)
00268   {
00269     m_InputImageRegion.push_back(_arg);
00270 
00271   }
00272 
00273   void AddMask(MaskType *mask)
00274   {
00275     m_MaskArray.push_back( mask );
00276   }
00277 
00278   // Set/Get output image region
00279   itkSetMacro(OutputImageRegion, OutputImageRegionType);
00280   itkGetMacro(OutputImageRegion, OutputImageRegionType);
00281 
00282   // Set/Get number of iterations
00283   itkSetMacro(Iterations, unsigned int);
00284   itkGetMacro(Iterations, unsigned int);
00285 
00286   // Set/Get the optimization method
00287   itkSetMacro(OptimizationMethod, unsigned int);
00288   itkGetMacro(OptimizationMethod, unsigned int);
00289 
00290   // Set/Get lambda
00291   itkSetMacro(Lambda, float);
00292   itkGetMacro(Lambda, float);
00293 
00294   // Set/Get PSF
00295   itkSetMacro(PSF, unsigned int);
00296   itkGetMacro(PSF, unsigned int);
00297

00302                   (Concept::HasNumericTraits<PixelType>));
00304 #endif

00306 protected:
00307   SuperResolutionImageFilter( void );
00308   ~SuperResolutionImageFilter( void ) {};
00309 
00310   void PrintSelf( std::ostream& os, Indent indent ) const;
00311 
00316   void GenerateData();
00317 
00318 private:
00319 
00320   SuperResolutionImageFilter( const Self& ); //purposely not implemented
00321   void operator=( const Self& ); //purposely not implemented
00322 
00323   void OptimizeByLeastSquares();
00324 
00325   SizeType                    m_Size;              // Size of the output image
00326   TransformPointerArrayType   m_Transform;         // Coordinate transform to use
00327   InputImageRegionVectorType  m_InputImageRegion;
00328 
00329   OutputImageRegionType       m_OutputImageRegion;
00330 
00331   std::vector<InputImagePointer>  m_ImageArray;
00332   std::vector<MaskPointer>                      m_MaskArray;
00333 
00334   VnlVectorType     m_x;
00335 
00336   float m_Lambda;
00337 
00338   unsigned int                  m_Iterations;
00339 
00340   PixelType         m_DefaultPixelValue; // default pixel value
00341                                                // if the point is
00342                                                // outside the image
00343   SpacingType       m_OutputSpacing;     // output image spacing
00344   OriginPointType   m_OutputOrigin;      // output image origin
00345   DirectionType     m_OutputDirection;   // output image direction cosines
00346   IndexType         m_OutputStartIndex;  // output image start index
00347   bool              m_UseReferenceImage;
00348 
00349   unsigned int m_OptimizationMethod;
00350   unsigned int m_PSF;
00351 
00352 };
